Name: La Casona
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place. Everything was perfect, soft atmosphere and food was great, meat was cooked In the way I like (medium rare). There were a pianoforte too! Thanks to the owner, Jolanthe,  I've found the best wine, just to fill me like I drink a good one in Italy. I look Forward to come back to eat here again.
